sentences.sContent: By far his favourite invention was the record player. His other famous invention was the light bulb.
sentences.sContent_eng: By far his favourite invention was the record player. His other famous invention was the light bulb.
sentences.sCn: 他最中意的发明是录音机，他另一个著名的发明是电灯泡。

sentences.sContent: When you suddenly you see a bright light like the sun or a light bulb then you feel like you are going to sneeze.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you suddenly you see a bright light like the sun or a light bulb then you feel like you are going to sneeze.
sentences.sCn: 当你突然看到类似于太阳 或者电灯泡所发出的一束强光时， 你会觉得好像有种打喷嚏的冲动。

sentences.sContent: In this way the light bulb requests an address block from the light switch, the light switch in turn from the electrical system which in turn requests one from the room/floor controller.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this way the light bulb requests an address block from the light switch, the light switch in turn from the electrical system which in turn requests one from the room/floor controller.
sentences.sCn: 依照这种方式, 电灯泡会向电灯开关申请一个地址段, 而电灯开关则会向其上级的电力系统转交申请, 电力系统则将申请转交给该房间/该层的控制器.

trans.tranOther: the glass object inside a lamp that produces light and has to be replaced regularly
